title: Emerald Bloom Jhumka - Jadau Kundan Earrings
materials: 22K Gold Plated. Set with Jadau Kundan stones and accented with Emerald Green Hydro stones and freshwater pearls. Crafted with Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting shine.
features: These Jhumka earrings feature a unique square stud design, intricately set with Jadau Kundan. The emerald green hydro stone accents add a vibrant pop of color. The tiered jhumka bells are adorned with more Kundan stones, freshwater pearls, and hanging emerald green accents, creating a graceful cascade.
colors: and Cream (Pearls). A refreshing and classic color combination symbolizing prosperity and growth.
occasions: and modern celebrations. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to any formal gathering.
description: A stunning blend of traditional South Indian craftsmanship and contemporary design. The Jadau Kundan setting showcases exceptional artistry, while the vibrant emerald green hydro stones add a modern flair. Lightweight and comfortable to wear, these earrings are a timeless investment that will be cherished for generations.
